column1: File Description: Contains measurements of vegetation parameters from Eden Landing salt marsh taken 2021-2022 for a sediment study.
Methods: Plot-based measurements of vegetation; see USGS SOP and processing R Markdown for more information.
Acknowledgments:�funded by San Francisco Bay Regional Monitoring Program

Citation: U.S. Geological Survey, 2021-2022, Unpublished data
